title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 70.5 - Placard placement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 70.5 - Placard placement

State Regulations
A placard shall be placed on the extreme left side (usual
driver side) of the rear facing portion of the rear bumper. If a vehicle lacks
a bumper, the placard shall be mounted at least 15 inches, but not more than 30
inches, above the ground near the left side (usual driver side) of the rear of
the vehicle. A vehicle may have additional placards. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
70.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
